ITM 0
00111000
00111000
00111000
00010000
00011000
00010000
00011000
00000000
NAME key
DLG ITM_0

ITM 1
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
NAME lock
DLG ITM_1

ITM 2
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000
00000000

DLG ITM_0
"""
{
  - {item "key"} == 1 ?
    you found a key
  - {item "key"} == 2 ?
    you found another key
  - {item "key"} == 3 ?
    again another key
  - {item "key"} == 4 ?
    you might need them later
  - {item "key"} == 5 ?
    why would someone need so many keys
  - {item "key"} == 6 ?
    is there as many doors somewhere ?
  - {item "key"} == 7 ?
    or is it one door with many locks ?
  - {item "key"} == 8 ?
    a keychain would be great
  - {item "key"} == 9 ?
    mhh
}
"""

DLG SPR_0
i'm stuck here

DLG SPR_1
can you help me get down ?

DLG SPR_2
you're not gonna do anything, right ?

DLG ITM_1
"""
{
  - {item "lock"} == 1 ?
    a door it is
}
"""

END 0
did you lock something inside ?

END 1
did you lock the door ?

END 2


END 3
